Section.Catchline: Mini truck and low-speed vehicle license plates.

Subsection.Text: The department shall issue a license plate to the owner or lessee of any vehicle registered as a low-speed vehicle as defined in s. 320.01(42) or a mini truck as defined in s. 320.01(45) upon payment of the appropriate license taxes and fees prescribed in s. 320.08.
The license plate for a low-speed vehicle or mini truck shall comply with the provisions of s. 320.06.
